title: History of Mithila
content: Mithila has a rich history dating back to ancient times, with mentions in Hindu epics like the Ramayana and Mahabharata.
The region has been a center of learning and culture, home to many philosophers, scholars, and artists over the centuries.
Mithila has seen the rise and fall of various dynasties and has been influenced by different cultures, resulting in its unique heritage.

historicalEvents.title: Ramayana Era
historicalEvents.description: Mithila was the kingdom of King Janaka, father of Sita in the Ramayana.

historicalEvents.title: Licchavi Period
historicalEvents.description: The Licchavi dynasty ruled Mithila from around 1st century BCE to 8th century CE.

historicalEvents.title: Karnata Dynasty
historicalEvents.description: The Karnata dynasty ruled Mithila from the 11th to 14th century CE.

historicalEvents.title: Darbhanga Raj
historicalEvents.description: The Darbhanga Raj was established in the 16th century and continued until Indian independence.
